definition: to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet

sentences.english: Heavy rainfall has caused water levels of the Liujiang River to rise. (ChinaFotoPress/Getty Images)
sentences.chinese: 強降雨已造成了柳江的水位上升。

sentences.english: This season, frequent rainfall, the temperature gradually lower end of the 10 snowbound mountainous.
sentences.chinese: 此季節降雨頻繁，氣溫漸低，10月末將大雪封山。

sentences.english: It need quite a long time return to the former stability after rain, 5.
sentences.chinese: 降雨過後相當長時間，滑坡才能恢復到雨前的穩定性。

sentences.english: Heavier rainfall could also cause soil erosion and landslides.
sentences.chinese: 而強降雨也可能導致泥土的腐蝕和山體滑坡。

sentences.english: Raindrops have splashed clay particles and organic matter into the furrows, further than the sand particles.
sentences.chinese: 降雨沖刷使粘土和有機物比沙粒更多的流入壟溝。

sentences.english: I want to pray to God with my utmost sincere heart and I am willing to sacrifice my life to plead God for rain.
sentences.chinese: 我要用最虔誠的心向天神禱告，願捨身祈求上天降雨。

sentences.english: Description : Raindrops have splashed clay particles and organic matter into the furrows, further than the sand particles.
sentences.chinese: 降雨沖刷使粘土和有機物比沙粒更多的流入壟溝。

sentences.english: Amount of day precipitations in in, cm or mm.
sentences.chinese: 每天以英寸，釐米，毫米的降雨量。

sentences.english: Much more rainfall will be needed before droughty conditions are alleviated.
sentences.chinese: 棉區需要更多降雨以緩解旱情。

sentences.english: The heavy monsoon rains left 17 people dead and thousands displaced in several districts in Sri Lanka.
sentences.chinese: 強降雨已造成該國至少17人死亡，上千人被迫轉移。

sentences.english: Then, rainfall estimated by radar data is inverted from the sequence of Z-I relation.
sentences.chinese: 然後，用這組關係得到降雨的雷達估算值。

sentences.english: The dragons of Japan are water deities, frequently associated with rainfall and bodies of water.
sentences.chinese: 日本的龍是水神，經常讓人聯想到降雨和水體。

sentences.english: The rainfall in this area averages 800mm a year.
sentences.chinese: 這個地區降雨量年均800毫米。

sentences.english: A sump can catch large amounts of rain and allow it to naturally percolate.
sentences.chinese: 阿水池可以捕獲大量的降雨，並允許它自然滲透。

sentences.english: The major control factor of water quality is precipitation and runoff.
sentences.chinese: 降雨和徑流爲三亞灣海域水質參數變化的控制因子。

sentences.english: Dalphiaana: Or forming them when it is necessary, like the rainmakers used to do?
sentences.chinese: 或者需要的時候形成雲，像使用人工降雨設備那樣？

definition: Yushui or Rain Water, 2nd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 19th February-5th March
precipitation over a large area/widespread rain
